name: 100% Orange Juice Visual Novel (Demo)
description:
The demo for a fan-made 100% Orange Juice visual novel, set in a university AU. Play as Sora as she explores the world around her, meets new friends, and considers how to spend her university life.

(Currently only up to the route split. Routes will be done in the complete build.)

This is a demo. Assets can and probably will change between now and the final project. 

Length: 13.5k words
Estimated runtime: 1 to 1.5 hours, depending on reading speed.
Language: English
